name: Pavi Singh
headline: Securing Systems. Automating Everything.
about: System Security Specialist with 7+ years of experience in IT infrastructure and cybersecurity. From network administration across 13 campuses to securing government systems, I've evolved from managing routers and firewalls to orchestrating enterprise security solutions. Deep expertise in automation, threat detection, and infrastructure security. I build tools that scale security operations and eliminate manual processes.

experience.title: System Security Specialist
highlights: Protect critical government information systems from cyber threats
Identify vulnerabilities and develop security strategies
Collaborate with cross-functional teams on security initiatives
Implement security protocols and monitoring solutions
Automate security workflows using SOAR platforms and custom scripts

experience.title: Network Administrator
highlights: Administered network infrastructure across 13 campuses throughout Yukon Territory
Managed Switches, Routers, Cisco ISE, and Palo Alto Firewalls and IPS systems
Wrote Python and Ansible scripts to automate system component updates
Managed wireless infrastructure (Cisco, Unifi, and Fortinet controllers and APs)
Set up secure Wi-Fi, LAN and VoIP networks at remote locations
Managed application patches, data backup, security changes and network configuration

experience.title: IT Support Technician
highlights: Resolved complex issues including system crashes, network slowdowns, and security breaches
Helped migrate Office 365 to new tenant environment
Wrote PowerShell and Python scripts to automate multiple tasks
Used PDQ Deploy for application deployment on end user machines
Introduced new asset management system for improved IT operations
